newsitem.title: UK: National Express looking to form Euro jv.
newsitem.headline: National Express looking to form Euro jv.

text.p: British transport operator National Express Group Plc said on Thursday it hoped to announce soon the formation of a joint venture with a European public transport group.
"It is anticipated that the joint venture company will explore acquisition opportunities initially in Scandinavia and Germany," chairman Michael Davies told the company's annual general meeting.
The company said in a statement it was confident the group would progress satisfactorily this year and would continue to develop in the UK and overseas.
